dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 8702 IH: Taxpayers Support Life Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Cline (for himself, Mr. Hice of Georgia, Mrs. Cammack, Mr. Fulcher, Mr. Buck, Mr. Duncan, Mr. Norman, Mr. Mullin, Mr. Johnson of Louisiana, Mr. Weber of Texas, Mr. Van Drew, Mr. Smith of Nebraska, Mr. Babin, Mr. Banks, Mr. Feenstra, Mr. Allen, Mr. Moolenaar, Mr. Loudermilk, Mr. Clyde, Mr. Jordan, Mr. Gohmert, Mr. Keller, Mr. Steube, Mr. Palazzo, Mr. Jacobs of New York, Mr. Biggs, Mr. LaTurner, Mr. McKinley, Mr. Fitzgerald, Ms. Tenney, Mr. Mooney, Mr. Tiffany, Mr. Lamborn, Mr. Good of Virginia, Mrs. Miller of Illinois, Mrs. Boebert, Mr. Mast, Mr. Guest, and Mr. Grothman) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To prohibit the implementation of the proposed rule entitled Nondiscrimination in Health Programs and Activities.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Taxpayers Support Life Act.

section.header: Prohibiting implementation of proposed rule entitled Nondiscrimination in Health Programs and Activities

subsection.text: The Secretary of Health and Human Services may not finalize, implement, administer, or enforce the proposed rule entitled Nondiscrimination in Health Programs and Activities (RIN: 0945–AA17).
No Federal funds may be used—

paragraph.text: to finalize, implement, administer, or enforce the proposed rule described in subsection (a); or

in contravention of administering or enforcing the final rule entitled Nondiscrimination in Health and Health Education Programs or Activities, Delegation of Authority (85 Fed. Reg. 37160) and dated June 19, 2020.
